IncidentDef.label: damaged psychic ship part crash
IncidentDef.letterText:
A large damaged piece of an ancient ship has crashed nearby.

Your colonists can feel it in the back of their mind, exhorting weird behaviors. It must have an onboard damaged AI persona with damaged psychic projection ability. It's hard to say if this AI is friendly or not.

In doubt, destroy it as soon as possible.

IncidentDef.label: damaged poison ship part crash
IncidentDef.letterText:
A large damaged piece of an ancient ship has crashed nearby.

It is leaking altered toxic material and will alter all plants in an expanding circle around itself in a undetermined way.

Long term exposition is definitively not recommanded, destroy it as soon as possible.
